channel.title: Poynter E-Media Tidbits
channel.description: A group Weblog by the sharpest minds in online media/journalism/publishing. Umlauts: äöüßÄÖÜ Chinese: 老师是四十四，是不是？ Finnish: Mustan kissan paksut posket. (ah, no special chars) Kärpänen sanoi kärpäselle: tuu kattoon kattoon ku kaveri tapettiin tapettiin.
